      • compare

        public static int compare(Calendar c1,
          Calendar c2)
        Compare to calendars.
        Parameters:
        c1 - First calendar.
        c2 - Second calendar
        Returns:
        1 if c1 > c2, 0 if c1 = c2, -1 if c1 < c2.
